EmailTemplate.name: Blogger Briefing follow up
EmailTemplate.subject: since you missed it…
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Sorry that we missed you at our recent update briefing. Just in case you need to catch up on what we're doing or want a glimpse of what we're working on, I'm including a link to the webcast playback <http://bit.ly/13JSltc>. Skip around or watch it end-to-end … I'd love to get your feedback.
Thanks Lauren
Lauren Whitehouse Director, Product Marketing | VMTurbo email: lauren.whitehouse@vmturbo.com office: 781-418-5237 | skype: laurenwhitehouse
Follow me on Twitter @lauwhitehouse Connect with me on LinkedIn <http://linkd.in/XXWndz>
